name: selfsave
source:
ecode = document.querySelector('.CodeMirror-code')
ecode.style.fontSize = '17.5px'; // 13px
fp = 'file:///Users/rainerg/ajr/Aspirin/node_modules/cson/docs/index.html';

Object.keys(fs)
Object.keys(windowManager.windows)

source = editor.getValue();
hash = md5(source)

remote.app.db.insert({name:'selfsave',md5:hash,source:source})
just.setName(warr[w.id]) justShowResult(''+w.id +' : '+ warr[w.id]+'', true)
justShowResult(van_dump(cw.getBounds()))
document.getElementById('source').innerText = 'bozontest'

a = _(windowManager.windows)
  .chain()
  .map(function(v,k){return [v.object.id, k]})
	.object()
	.value()
setContent('aa')

cw.setPosition(0, 0) cw.setSize(screen.width, screen.height) document.body.style.opacity = .5 txt = `
###
`; setContent(txt)
